p: In conclusion, we think the vanishing of swidden agriculture and the development of modern products are the main reasons why fleagrass in China is disappearing. Nevertheless, we found that few Akha people of China continue to use fleagrass in perfume, to repel insects and to alleviate insect bites. Therefore, we think that fleagrass is effective at repelling insects and alleviating insect bites, but it is not widely known.
